articles.title: Twist In Europe's Biggest Tax Fraud Case Involving Indian-Origin Tycoon - NDTV
articles.description: The practice was named after Latin term, and allows multiple people to claim ownership of a stock and claim refunds on dividend tax that was only paid once.
articles.content:
Sanjay Shah was an unemployed trader who amassed $700 million within a few years.
Banks in the UK are set to be impacted by a tax fraud scandal, said to be Europe's biggest. According to UK-based fi… [+2792 chars]
